topics.title: Video Games
topics.description: News about the development, production, sales, and use of video games.

topics.title: Asset-Backed Securities
topics.description: Bonds or notes that are based on pools of assets, or collateralized by the cash flows from a specified pool of underlying assets.

topics.title: Mortgage Agency Debt
topics.description: The issuance, pricing and trading of debt securities, usually in the form of bonds, issued by mortgage agencies.

topics.title: Bank Qualified
topics.description: News about bank-qualified bonds, which allow banks to deduct interest paid to carry those bonds.  Bank-qualified bonds are typically issued for a public purpose in small amounts.

topics.title: Credit and Corporate Debt
topics.description: The issuance, pricing and trading of corporate debt securities, including derivatives such as CDS, equity-linked bonds and covered bonds, as well as the issuance and syndication of loans to corporates.

topics.title: Collateralized Debt Obligations
topics.description: Debt securities backed by a pool of bonds, loans and/or other assets.

topics.title: Credit Default Swaps
topics.description: The issuance, pricing and trading of Credit Default Swaps, or any financial swap arrangement under which the seller of the CDS will compensate the buyer in the event of a loan default or other defined credit event.

topics.title: Commodities Markets
topics.description: Production, consumption and trading in primary commodities markets, including agricultural, energy, metals and diamonds. Also includes weather and shipping news affecting commodities markets.

topics.title: Debt / Fixed Income Markets
topics.description: Bond and other debt and credit market news, including new issues, yields and other rates, analyses, and market performance. Credit and corporate debt; government, agency, municipal and supranational debt; eurobonds and asset-backed debt.

topics.title: Derivatives
topics.description: Derivatives including futures, options, warrants, spreads, swaps, contracts for differences and other financial instruments that derive their basic value from other instruments and assets traded for cash. New issues of derivatives, forecasts and analyses of a derivatives market, market structure.

topics.title: Equity-Linked Bonds
topics.description: All news about equity-linked bonds, including convertible and exchangeable bonds and warrant-bearing bonds.

topics.title: Exchange-Traded Funds
topics.description: A fund that can be continuously traded on an exchange, which is generally comprised of a basket of financial instruments mirroring the composition of a securities market index.  ETFs offer low expense ratios relative to other funds and trade within a narrow spread with respect to NAV.  Although the legal structure of ETFs is generally open-ended, their distinct characteristics compel investors to treat as a discrete fund type.

topics.title: Eurobonds
topics.description: New eurobond issues in Europe; including issues by foreign borrowers in domestic markets where there is no eurobond market e.g. Swiss francs. Exclude corporate or domestic government bonds, e.g. gilts, Bunds, Samurais & Yankees.

topics.title: Currencies / Foreign Exchange Markets
topics.description: Exchange rates and analyses of currency markets. Comments on foreign-exchange developments.

topics.title: General Obligation Debt
topics.description: News about general obligation debt issued by state and local government entities; GO notes and taxable GO debt; general obligation certificates of participation; state appropriation debt; and news about new GO financings and new capital programs.

topics.title: National Government Debt
topics.description: News about all national government bond and debt instrument markets. Includes treasury gilts, bonds and notes (not T-bills, which are money market instruments).

topics.title: Volatile Shares / Hot Stocks
topics.description: News about sharp changes in the price of a share or prices of several shares in the same market sector.

topics.title: High-Yield Securities
topics.description: The issuance, pricing and trading of debt securities that carry a relatively high risk of default and thus pay a relatively high yield, also sometimes known as junk bonds.

topics.title: Investment Grade Securities
topics.description: The issuance, pricing and trading of debt securities that carry a relatively low risk of default and thus pay a relatively low yield.

topics.title: Index-Linked Bonds
topics.description: Bonds linked to an underlying index, usually inflation.

topics.title: Insurance-Linked Securities
topics.description: The issuance, pricing and trading of financial instruments whose values are driven by insurance loss events.

topics.title: Loans
topics.description: Issuance, syndication, trading of loans by banks (or institutional investors) to corporate or institutional borrowers; trends in loan markets and issuance.

topics.title: Money Markets
topics.description: All money market news; reports about money markets. Trading in all money market instruments. Short-term borrowing and lending between banks.

topics.title: Mortgage-Backed Markets
topics.description: Mortgage-backed debt and securities, mortgage advances and changes in mortgage rates and conditions.

topics.title: Options
topics.description: All market reports that routinely mention options; all new issues of options; news items concerning forecasts and analyses of the options market; regulation of options markets.

topics.title: Pipelines

topics.title: Shale Oil / Shale Gas

topics.title: Equities Markets
topics.description: Share market trading news, including the performance of share market indexes and individual shares.

topics.title: Sukuk
topics.description: Sukuk debt, typically defined as Islamic bonds or debt instruments that adhere to sharia (Islamic law).

topics.title: Taxables
topics.description: News about taxable bonds, which are issued for purposes the federal government deems does not provide a significant benefit to the public.

topics.title: Terms / Conditions

topics.title: US Corporate Bonds
topics.description: All news about U.S. corporate bonds, including issues, forecasts and analysis.

topics.title: Sovereign Debt Auctions
topics.description: Debt instruments offered by national governments in primary markets, usually by way of an auction, including announcements of planned sales, terms of the debt instruments offered, and auction results.

topics.title: Credit Enhancement
topics.description: News about credit enhancement, such as bond insurance and letters of credit and the companies that provide these products.

topics.title: Commercial Mortgage-Backed Securities
topics.description: Types of mortgage-backed security backed by mortgages on commercial rather than residential real estate.

topics.title: Covered Bonds
topics.description: Mortgage-backed bonds where underlying collateral remains on the balance sheet, including issuance, pricing, secondary trading and general trends.

topics.title: Exchange-Traded Products
topics.description: An Exchange-Traded Product (ETP) is an investment instrument that tracks the performance of an underlying asset or an asset index. ETPs are structured to allow investors to gain exposure to underlying assets without trading futures or taking physical delivery and are especially popular in the commodities market. Also known as Exchange-Traded Vehicles (ETVs).

topics.title: Funds
topics.description: The views, forecasts, strategies and market actions of fund operators and other significant groups and classes of investors and traders with regard to capital flows across and within asset markets. Includes news about market performance of any and all types of funds including influential single-party traders and significant asset allocation decisions and views.

topics.title: Municipal Debt
topics.description: News about all local, state and sub-national bond and debt issuance markets. Includes state, local authority, local agency and general obligation bonds. Municipal bonds.

topics.title: Non-Deliverable Forwards

topics.title: Transmission Lines
topics.description: Power transmission grids.

topics.title: Real Estate Markets

Including property returns and forecasts, housing data, land prices, mortgage-backed bond issues. Property deals such as building transactions or corporate sales and leasebacks. Property related government initiatives, regulatory issues, and the launch and performance of property investment products or sector indexes. Also major infrastructure projects.

topics.title: Revenue Bonds
topics.description: News about revenue bonds, issued by state, local authority and agency entities, that finance income-producing projects and are secured by a specified revenue source.

topics.title: Supranational Agency Debt

topics.title: Corporate Debt
topics.description: All stories concerning the issuance, pricing, filing and redemption of debt instruments issued by a company. Includes convertible and other equity-linked bonds.

topics.title: Hedge Funds
topics.description: In general, a hedge fund is a managed portfolio of investments aiming at returning an absolute performance, regardless of the underlying trends in the financial markets.  Hedge funds use advanced investment strategies such as leverage, long, short, and derivative positions in order to capture market inefficiencies in both domestic and international markets with the goal of generating high returns. Hedge funds have far more flexibility in investment strategies than traditional funds, and the portfolios are usually highly leveraged.

topics.title: Medium-Term Notes
topics.description: Medium-term debt securities issued by government and non-government entities. Full range of maturities and amounts are available although typically maturing in 5-10 years, with more or less conventional features incorporated such as fixed or floating coupon basis.

topics.title: Residential Mortgage-Backed Securities

topics.title: Tungsten
topics.description: Extraction, transport, processing, trading / broking, demand for and use of tungsten.  Organisations associated with tungsten.

topics.title: Tin
topics.description: Extraction, transport, processing, trading / broking, demand for and use of tin.  Organisations associated with tin.

topics.title: Timber / Lumber
topics.description: Growth, transport, processing, trading / broking, demand for and use of timber / lumber.  Organisations associated with timber / lumber.

topics.title: Tanker Freight
topics.description: Seaborne transport of oil, oil products and liquefied gas by tankers, closely related onshore infrastructure, bookings and costs of tankers, accidents, government policy and regulation. Organisations associated with tankers.

topics.title: Tantalite
topics.description: Extraction, transport, processing, trading / broking, demand for and use of tantalite.  Organisations associated with tantalite.

topics.title: Titanium
topics.description: Extraction, transport, processing, trading / broking, demand for and use of titanium.  Organisations associated with titanium.

topics.title: Uranium
topics.description: The mining, production, processing, export and supply of uranium. The uranium market and uranium trade. Included on corporate news about uranium miners and regulatory news about government policy relating to the supply of uranium. Not included on stories about uranium enrichment for nuclear weapons.

topics.title: Vanadium
topics.description: Extraction, transport, processing, trading / broking, demand for and use of vanadium.  Organisations associated with vanadium.

topics.title: Americas Crudes
topics.description: Americas crude oil streams

topics.title: Asia Crudes
topics.description: Asian crude oil streams

topics.title: Biomass
topics.description: Production, consumption, transportation, pricing, regulation and use of energy generated by biological material from living or recently living organisms.

topics.title: Beef
topics.description: Production, consumption, pricing food safety issues and regulations relating to beef and beef products.

topics.title: Dry Bulk Freight
topics.description: Seaborne transport of dry bulk freight including grains, coal and cement, related onshore infrastructure. Bookings and costs of vessels, accidents, government policy and regulation.

topics.title: Lead
topics.description: Extraction, transport, processing, trading / broking, demand for and use of lead.  Organisations associated with lead.

topics.title: Middle East Crudes
topics.description: Middle Eastern crude oil streams

topics.title: North Sea Crudes
topics.description: North Sea crude oil streams

topics.title: Poultry
topics.description: Production, transportation, pricing, animal welfare issues and regulations relating to live poultry.

topics.title: Rare Earths
topics.description: Extraction, production, consumption, transportation, pricing, regulation, processing and use of rare earth elements or REEs, which are also known as rare earth metals and consist of 17 chemical element in the periodic table, including the 15 lanthanides plus scandium and yttrium.

topics.title: Rice
topics.description: Growth, transport, processing, trading / broking, demand for and use of Rice.  Organisations associated with Rice.

topics.title: US Crudes
topics.description: US crude oil streams

topics.title: Wine
topics.description: Production, transport, processing, trading / broking, demand for and use of wine and wine products.  Organisations associated with wine.

topics.title: Africa Crudes
topics.description: African crude oil streams

topics.title: Australasia Crudes
topics.description: Australasian crude oil streams

topics.title: Base Metals
topics.description: Common non-precious metals such as copper, tin, or zinc.

topics.title: Cellulosic Biofuels
topics.description: Production, transport, processing, trading / broking, demand for and use of next generation biofuels, chiefly ethanol, derived from cellulosic materials such as woody waste, leaves, stalks or non-food crops such as switchgrass.

topics.title: Biodiesel
topics.description: Production, transport, processing, trading / broking, demand for and use of biodiesel fuel, which resembles mineral diesel and is derived from animal or vegetable oils and fats.

topics.title: Bioethanol
topics.description: Production, transport, processing, trading / broking, demand for and use of bioethanol fuel, made from grains, sugar and other starches and which can be substituted for gasoline.

topics.title: Canada Crudes
topics.description: Canadian crude oil streams

topics.title: Coconut Oil
topics.description: Production, transport, processing, trading / broking, demand for and use of Coconut Oil.  Organisations associated with Coconut Oil.

topics.title: Arabica
topics.description: Growth, transport, processing, trading / broking, demand for and use of arabica coffee. Organisations associated with arabica coffee.

topics.title: Robusta
topics.description: Growth, transport, processing, trading / broking, demand for and use of robusta coffee. Organisations associated with robusta coffee.

topics.title: Corn Oil
topics.description: Production, transport, processing, trading / broking, demand for and use of Corn-Maize Oil.  Organisations associated with Corn-Maize Oil.

topics.title: Middle Distillates
topics.description: Production, transport, processing, trading / broking, demand for and use of middle distillates, including diesel, heating oil and jet kerosene.

topics.title: Europe / Middle East / Africa Crudes
topics.description: Europe / Middle East / Africa crude oil streams

topics.title: Latin America Crudes
topics.description: Latin American crude oil streams

topics.title: Minor Metals / Minerals
topics.description: Uncommon and scarce metals such as arsenic, cadmium, cobalt, uranium.

topics.title: North Asia Crudes
topics.description: North Asian crude oil streams

topics.title: Olive Oil
topics.description: Production, transport, processing, trading / broking, demand for and use of Olive Oil.  Organisations associated with Olive Oil.

topics.title: Pigs / Hogs
topics.description: Production, transportation, pricing, animal welfare issues and regulations relating to live pigs / hogs.

topics.title: Peanut Oil
topics.description: Production, transport, processing, trading / broking, demand for and use of Peanut-Groundnut Oil.  Organisations associated with Peanut-Groundnut Oil.

topics.title: Pork Bellies
topics.description: Production, consumption, pricing food safety issues and regulations relating to pork bellies.

topics.title: Pork
topics.description: Production, consumption, pricing food safety issues and regulations relating to pork products (excluding pork bellies).

topics.title: Precious Metals
topics.description: Valuable metals such as gold, silver, or platinum.

topics.title: Rapeseed / Canola Oil
topics.description: Production, transport, processing, trading / broking, demand for and use of Canola-Rapeseed Oil.  Organisations associated with Canola-Rapeseed Oil.

topics.title: Russia / Other CIS Crudes
topics.description: Russian / Other CIS crude oil streams

topics.title: South East Asia Crudes
topics.description: South East Asian crude oil streams

topics.title: Sunflower Oil
topics.description: Production, transport, processing, trading / broking, demand for and use of Sunflower Oil.  Organisations associated with Sunflower Oil.

topics.title: Transportation Markets / Transportation
topics.description: Freight transport by road, rail, sea and river as well as movement of energy by oil or gas pipelines and electrical transmission lines.

topics.title: Credit / Debt Ratings
topics.description: The issuing of an assessment of the credit worthiness of borrowers and potential borrowers. These published ratings for securities such as preferred stock and debt issues are based on the likelihood of consistent and timely payments.

topics.title: Bond Inventory Balances
topics.description: News about bond inventory balances and unsold balances and account-closed and free-to-trade announcements.

topics.title: Central Banks / Central Bank Events
topics.description: Policies of and changes at any central bank, reserve bank, or monetary authority.

topics.title: Competitive Bond Sales
topics.description: News about competitive bond sales, including presale stories.

topics.title: Chinese Yuan Offshore
topics.description: Market comments and stories about the Chinese yuan when traded offshore.

topics.title: Dividends
topics.description: Dividend forecasts, declarations and payments. Announcements or projections of payment of a dividend and any major increases or decreases to its dividend.

topics.title: Economic Indicators
topics.description: Stories on economic indicator / data releases, including polls, forecasts and other stories wholly about economic indicators.

topics.title: ESG
topics.description: News and research relating to a company's environmental, social and governance standards used by ethical investors to screen their investments. Environmental standards measure how a company's activities affect the natural environment, while social standards are concerned with how a company manages relationships with its employees, suppliers, customers and the communities where it operates, and governance standards deal with how a company is managed and the interests of shareholders are served.

topics.title: Government Borrowing Requirement
topics.description: The amount government needs to borrow in order to fund the gap between expenditure and revenue.

topics.title: Economic Output
topics.description: Official GDP and GNP data releases, forecasts and other stories wholly about GDP or GNP.

topics.title: General News
topics.description: All news that is not primarily financial, business or sports.

topics.title: Interest Rates / Policy
topics.description: Events relating to base lending rates and official interest rates set by central banking authorities.

topics.title: Initial Public Offerings
topics.description: News about initial public share offers - includes initial offers to professional investors such as via placings.

topics.title: Industrial Output
topics.description: Industrial production figures and forecasts. All measures of manufacturing output including the Purchasing Managers' Indices.

topics.title: New Issues
topics.description: News about new government, supranational and corporate issues of debt and all new equity issues.

topics.title: Labour / Personnel
topics.description: Labour issues, employment, unemployment, work relations, labour disputes, strikes, legislation, unions, job related issues, working conditions, employment discrimination, government employment policy and labour market reform.

topics.title: Economic Events
topics.description: News and analysis relating to the state of an economy, including government and central bank-related matters, economic forecasts and economic indicator announcements.

topics.title: Mergers / Acquisitions / Takeovers
topics.description: Includes news of any actual or possible purchase of a company, combination or unification of two or more companies, units or subsidiaries, and the acquisition of major assets such as infrastructure operating concessions or complete product lines. Also includes a company or party gaining more than a 50% stake in another company or increasing its control above that level.

topics.title: Negotiated Sales
topics.description: News about negotiated sales -- a transaction conducted by an issuer via a hired syndicate. The issuer hires a banker to structure and price a deal. The banker picks a sales date, pre-markets the bonds to potential investors and prices the deal.

topics.title: Note Sales
topics.description: News about note sales (short-term debt), including presale stories.

topics.title: Purchasing Managers Surveys
topics.description: Forecasts and reports relating to purchasing managers surveys such as ISM or Markit PMI.

topics.title: Personalities / People
topics.description: News and profiles focused on the life or major moments in the life of individuals.

topics.title: Presale Announcements
topics.description: News about presale announcements, including orders to purchase part of a new municipal bond issue that is accepted by an underwriting syndicate before an official public offering.

topics.title: Broker Research / Recommendations
topics.description: The issuing of an investment opinion by a broker / analyst about whether a given stock is a 'buy', 'sell' or a 'hold', or giving a target share price.

topics.title: Performance / Results / Earnings
topics.description: All corporate financial results; tabular and textual reports; dividends; accounts, annual reports; forecasts and estimates of future earnings; corporate insolvencies and bankruptcies.

topics.title: Retail / Wholesale Sales Economic Indicators
topics.description: Retail and wholesale sales figures and forecasts as economic indicators.

topics.title: Bond Sales
topics.description: News about all bond sales, including presale stories.

topics.title: Equity Stakes
topics.description: The purchase or sale of a potentially significant stake in a company's equity by another company, individual or group of investors. These are deals that result in stakes of 50% or less in the target company.

topics.title: Accounting Issues
topics.description: Issues regarding an organisation's financial accounting and the auditing of the organization's financial statements and accounting records.  The company's adherence to generally accepted accounting principles, in all material respects. Also accounting-related investigations by regulatory agencies, accounting-related internal investigations and audits, and auditor changes.

topics.title: Corporate Events
topics.description: All business events relating to companies and other issuers of securities.

topics.title: Bankruptcy / Insolvency
topics.description: News about companies being declared insolvent or put into administration, their administration and liquidations. Includes a company announcing its plans to file for bankruptcy protection, filing an initial or revised plan of reorganisation, the granting of bankruptcy court approval to the company's plan of reorganisation, and a company's emergence from bankruptcy protection.

topics.title: Bonus Share Issues
topics.description: When a company makes a free issue of shares to shareholders, based upon the number of shares that a shareholder owns. Also known as a Bonus Issue, Free Issue, a Capitalization Issue or a Pro Rata Issue.

topics.title: Share Buybacks / Repurchases
topics.description: The purchase by a company of its own shares in the open market or by tender offer, usually based on the belief that the shares are undervalued and that buying them will provide a better investment return than putting cash into the underlying business of the company.

topics.title: Consumer Credit
topics.description: Levels of consumer borrowing, spending and saving.

topics.title: Change of CEO
topics.description: Change of a company's chief executive officer.

topics.title: Change of CFO
topics.description: Change of a company's chief financial officer / finance director.

topics.title: Share Consolidations
topics.description: Consolidations of shares in issue, sometimes called reverse stock splits.

topics.title: Corporate Debt Restructurings
topics.description: The restructurings of corporate debt by altering the terms and provisions of the existing debt issue or issuance of new debt to replace existing debt. Includes financial restructurings undertaken under administration and bankruptcy protection proceedings.

topics.title: Labour Disputes
topics.description: Disputes between unions and industries that could lead to major disruptions in production or services.

topics.title: Divestitures / Spin-Offs
topics.description: News of a company disposing of a significant part of its business. Could involve converting the business to be disposed of into a new, separate company with shareholders in the parent being given shares in the offshoot.

topics.title: Finals
topics.description: Indicates the level of competition is a Finals

topics.title: Leading Indicators
topics.description: Indices of leading indicators.

topics.title: Indices Changes
topics.description: News about market indexes, including changes in constituents, their weightings, the creation and abolition of indexes. Does not include routine market performance news.

topics.title: Inflation
topics.description: Inflation figures and forecasts. Consumer, retail, producer and wholesale prices and price indices.

topics.title: Market Events
topics.description: News about the operation of financial markets and exchanges including news about changes in market indexes, trading hours, regulations and news about changes in ownership and structure.

topics.title: Money Supply
topics.description: Money Supply figures and forecasts. All measures of narrow and broad money, including M0, M1, M2, M3 and M4.

topics.title: Employment / Unemployment
topics.description: Employment and unemployment figures. Payrolls, jobless rates and the volume of help-wanted job advertising.

topics.title: Oil Storage
topics.description: Storage of crude oil and refined oil products.

topics.title: Personal Investing
topics.description: All news about the process of investing on the part of individuals. News about investment tools, techniques and regulations for the individual investor and market trends that are related to individual investors; news about how investors interact with markets, detailing patterns of behaviour of the investors and their aggregate impact on the macro-economy. Includes information with advice from experts about how to invest and helping in the process of making selections between various financial instruments.

topics.title: Monetary / Fiscal Policy / Policy Makers
topics.description: Events covering monetary and fiscal policy and policy makers.

topics.title: Privatization
topics.description: The sale of a state-owned company or sale of a significant government stake in a company to a private investor or group of investors.

topics.title: Proxy Fights
topics.description: A proxy fight is an effort by activist shareholders of a publicly-traded company to gain partial or full control of the company by making a formal proposal to elect new members, backed by the dissidents, to the company's board of directors, to be voted on at a meeting of the company's shareholders, and then actively soliciting commitments from other shareholders to vote in favor of the proposal.

topics.title: Qualifying Rounds
topics.description: Indicates the level of competition is a Qualifying rounds

topics.title: Regulation
topics.description: Regulatory issues, including inquiries, investigations, findings and rulings against companies by pan-national, national and local government bodies, such as competition and antitrust investigations. Also includes regulation and deregulation of a market or an industry, but excludes company-specific accounting-related issues, which are covered by Accounting Issues [ACCI].

topics.title: Results Forecasts / Warnings
topics.description: Forecasts or "guidance" given by a company about its future results, including profit warnings.

topics.title: Shareholder Protection Plans
topics.description: The actions taken by corporations to discourage a hostile takeovers by another company.  These actions include 'poison pills', 'flip-in' and 'flip-over' options, 'people pills', 'suicide pills' and adopting a 'scorched-earth policy'. Also known as a Shareholder Rights Plan.

topics.title: Secondary Share Offerings / Issues
topics.description: Secondary share issues. The issue of new stock or derivatives such as warrants and convertible bonds from a company that has already made its initial public offering (IPO). Includes placings and rights issues. Does not include bonus issues.

topics.title: Production Status Changes
topics.description: A disruption and/or resumption of production or services.

topics.title: Workers Pay
topics.description: Stories about the levels of workers salaries, wages and benefits. Includes other forms of compensation such as share schemes, profit sharing, bonus schemes and loyalty payments.

topics.title: Strategic Combinations
topics.description: Any announcements of strategic alliance arrangement between two companies who have decided to collaborate or share resources in a specific project.  Or the formation of a joint venture where two or more companies are pooling resources to create a separate entity, or updating of an existing joint venture.

topics.title: Key Personnel Changes
topics.description: Changes of senior personnel in a corporation / organisation, including the chairperson, president, CEO and CFO.

topics.title: Business Sentiment
topics.description: Business sentiment surveys and indices. Levels of business confidence and business outlooks.

topics.title: Capacity Utilisation
topics.description: The ratio between industrial output and industrial capacity.

topics.title: Corporate Litigation
topics.description: Legal actions involving or affecting corporations and/or corporate officers. Includes news of moves to take legal action, judgments and dismissals of lawsuits.

topics.title: Class Actions
topics.description: A legal action against a company or companies where an individual represents a group in a court claim. The judgment from the suit is for all the members of the group (class).

topics.title: Company News
topics.description: Company news (added automatically when a story contains any company RIC).

topics.title: Products / Services
topics.description: News about products and services, including their development, launches, recalls, safety, litigation, regulatory approvals, sales and marketing.

topics.title: Consumer Sentiment
topics.description: Consumer sentiment surveys and indices. Levels of consumer confidence and consumption expectations.

topics.title: Directors Dealings
topics.description: The purchase or sale of shares by directors or other key employees or by their agents in the publicly quoted companies for which they work.

topics.title: Deals
topics.description: News about any actual or possible purchase of a company, combination or unification of two or more companies, units, subsidiaries, major assets, or complete product lines. Also includes news about change of ownership in a significant stake in a company, spin-offs of business units and sales and acquisitions of significant or potentially significant stakes in a company, as well as news about alliances and joint venture agreements between companies.

topics.title: Currency Devaluation
topics.description: Downward adjustments of a currency's official par value or central exchange rate.

topics.title: Durable Goods Orders
topics.description: Orders to factories for manufactured goods. Durable goods orders.

topics.title: Equity Capital Changes
topics.description: News about equity capital changes including IPOs and secondary share offers, buybacks, share redemptions and consolidations, share splits, bonus and scrip issues. Includes announcements that a company plans to make equity offering/placing, the pricing of offerings/placing and their completion.

topics.title: Home Sales
topics.description: New and existing home sales. Housing affordability indices.

topics.title: Inventories
topics.description: Manufacturers' and distributors' inventories. Stockpiles of goods on shelves and backlogs.

topics.title: Capital Movements
topics.description: Capital movement between countries. Invisible trade and overseas investment.

topics.title: Security Listings / Delistings
topics.description: When instruments are listed on or listed instruments are delisted from individual commercial exchanges. These can be exchanges trading in securities, options, futures or commodities. Includes movements from one sector to another sector and changes of listing category, e.g. from small cap to large cap.

topics.title: Shareholder Meetings
topics.description: News about a company's annual general meetings (AGMs), including business concerns addressed, ballots for company initiatives and company board elections; also includes news about extraordinary general meetings (EGMs) and other shareholder meetings and the issues behind them.

topics.title: Monopolies / Antitrust Issues
topics.description: Issues concerning competition law, including investigations into companies suspected of anti-competitive behaviour, and proposed takeovers and mergers, price-fixing and other restrictive business practices.

topics.title: Corporate Name Changes
topics.description: Corporate changes of identity, including rebranding, new logos, marketing slogans. Changes in the persona of a corporation which are designed to accord with and facilitate the attainment of business objectives, and are usually visibly manifested by way of branding and the use of trademarks.

topics.title: Change of President
topics.description: Change of a company's president.

topics.title: Quarter-Finals
topics.description: Indicates the level of competition is a Quarter-finals

topics.title: Product Recalls
topics.description: Requests made or actions taken by a manufacturer or seller to recall or withdraw a product from the market due to concerns about possible or actual safety issues or product defects.

topics.title: Restructuring / Reorganization
topics.description: A significant modification made to a company's existing operations or organisational structure, such as when a company closes a location and/or lays off a significant proportion of its workforce. Can include divestments but not acquisitions.

topics.title: Currency Revaluation
topics.description: Upward adjustments of a currency's official par value or central exchange rate.

topics.title: Semi-Finals
topics.description: Indicates the level of competition is a Semi-finals

topics.title: Trade / Current Account
topics.description: Current account / trade figures, including the balance of imports and exports.

topics.title: Expansions / New Markets / New Units
topics.description: A company moving into a new area of business or expanding its existing business. Includes a company expanding geographically by market or product or service offering, creating a new unit or starting a new line of business. Excludes acquisitions of other companies, which are covered by Mergers / Acquisitions / Takeovers [MRG].

topics.title: Bankruptcy Figures
topics.description: The number of business failures nationally. Bankruptcy and liquidation figures.

topics.title: Banking Capital and Liquidity Requirements
topics.description: Banking industry regulatory news regarding capital adequacy, stress testing and liquidity requirements including actions taken by individual banks to meet such requirements.

topics.title: Car Registrations
topics.description: New car registration figures. Car and truck sales.

topics.title: Change of Chairperson
topics.description: Change of a company's chairperson.

topics.title: Commodity Arbitrage
topics.description: News about commodity arbitrage, ie the practice of taking advantage of a price difference between two or more markets: striking a combination of matching deals that capitalize upon the imbalance, the profit being the difference between the market prices minus any transportation or transfer costs.

topics.title: Construction Figures
topics.description: Housing Starts, building permits and housing approvals. Construction spending and housing completion figures.

topics.title: Currency Intervention
topics.description: Trading by a central bank in the open market in order to influence exchange rates or stabilize market conditions.

topics.title: Job Cuts
topics.description: Workforce reductions including temporary layoffs and plans to cut jobs gradually through natural wastage.

topics.title: Medical Regulatory Issues
topics.description: Regulatory news concerning drugs and other medical products and treatments, including approvals and trial results.

topics.title: Management Issues / Policies
topics.description: Management issues including internal controls, executive pay, bonuses and corporate governance. Also includes corporate litigation and accounting issues, shareholder activism and shareholder protection plans.

topics.title: Mortgage Applications
topics.description: Mortgage applications and refinancing. Mortgage delinquency ratios.

topics.title: Order Imbalance
topics.description: Notification of an excess of buy or sell orders for a specific security on a trading exchange.

topics.title: Recapitalization
topics.description: Restructuring a company's debt and equity mix, a move which might result in returning capital to shareholders in the form of a special dividend or share buyback.

topics.title: Official Reserves
topics.description: Official reserve assets of foreign currency, gold and special drawing rights.

topics.title: Shareholder Activism
topics.description: An initiative by a shareholder to put pressure on the management of a public company on one or several issues such as board control, board representation, forcing or opposing an M&A transaction or reorganization or change in strategic direction. It can take several forms, such as proxy fights, negotiations with management, publicity campaigns, litigation, shareholder resolutions. See also Shareholder Meetings [MEET1].

topics.title: Share Splits / Bonus Issues
topics.description: Moves to increase a company's shares in issue without increasing shareholder funds, such as stock splits and bonus issues.

topics.title: Same-Store Sales
topics.description: A retailer's same-store sales reports.

topics.title: European Union
topics.description: Stories about the European Union, its institutions and the European Parliament.

topics.title: G7
topics.description: The Group of Seven (G7) nations which was formed in 1975 to facilitate economic cooperation among the seven major non-communist economic powers.

topics.title: G8
topics.description: The Group of Eight (G8) nations. Formed in 1998, the G8 adds Russia to the G7 group of major industrialized nations.

topics.title: Deutsche Bundesbank
topics.description: News of activities by, or involving, the central bank of the Federal Republic of Germany.

topics.title: Bank of Canada
topics.description: News of activities by, or involving, the central bank of Canada.

topics.title: Bank of England
topics.description: News of activities by, or involving, the central bank of the United Kingdom.

topics.title: Bank of Japan
topics.description: News of activities by, or involving, the central bank of Japan.

topics.title: European Central Bank
topics.description: News of activities of the Frankfurt-based central bank of the Eurozone, tasked with setting monetary policy in the countries who have the Euro as their currency, and whose sole objective is price stability.

topics.title: US Federal Reserve
topics.description: News of activities by, or involving, the central banking system of the United States.

topics.title: G20
topics.description: A grouping of developed and emerging economies that is emerging as the main international body coordinating attempts to fight financial crisis.

topics.title: International Criminal Court
topics.description: The International Criminal Court (ICC) is the first ever permanent, treaty-based, international institution, with jurisdiction to prosecute individuals responsible for the most serious crimes of international concern: genocide, crimes against humanity and war crimes. The jurisdiction of the ICC will be complementary to national courts, which means that the Court will only act when countries themselves are unable or unwilling to investigate or prosecute.

topics.title: International Monetary Fund
topics.description: Stories about the International Monetary Fund (IMF) and its work, such as helping member countries in financial difficulty.

topics.title: Reserve Bank of Australia
topics.description: News of activities by, or involving, the central bank of Australia.

topics.title: US Senate
topics.description: Elections to and activities by the upper house of the U.S. Congress, including any committees and individual senators as they pertain to the legislative process.

topics.title: Swiss National Bank
topics.description: News of activities by, or involving, the central bank of Switzerland.

topics.title: United Nations
topics.description: Stories about the United Nations which was established in 1945 to maintain international peace and security and to develop friendly relations among nations. Most of the world's sovereign states belong to the UN. Also use on stories about the UN agencies.

topics.title: World Trade Organization
topics.description: Stories about the World Trade Organization, its free trade negotiations and disputes.

topics.title: African Union
topics.description: Stories about the African Union, which superseded the Organisation of African Unity (OAU) in 2002 with the declared aim of promoting the member countries' development and integration.

topics.title: Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation
topics.description: Stories about the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) forum, which has the declared aim of promoting "sustainable economic growth and prosperity in the Asia-Pacific region".

topics.title: Bank of Mexico
topics.description: News of activities by, or involving, the central bank of Mexico.

topics.title: Central Bank of Brazil
topics.description: News of activities by, or involving, the central bank of Brazil.

topics.title: Central Bank of Nigeria
topics.description: News of activities by, or involving, the central bank of Nigeria.

topics.title: Central Bank of the Republic of Turkey
topics.description: News of activities by, or involving, the central bank of Turkey.

topics.title: Central Bank of Russia
topics.description: News of activities by, or involving, the central bank of Russia.

topics.title: Hungarian National Bank
topics.description: News of activities by, or involving, the central bank of Hungary.

topics.title: US House of Representatives
topics.description: Elections to and activities by the lower house of the U.S. Congress, including any committees and individual representatives as they pertain to the legislative process.

topics.title: International Atomic Energy Agency
topics.description: Stories about the International Atomic Energy Agency (IAEA) and its work.

topics.title: International Criminal Tribunal for the former Yugoslavia
topics.description: The International Criminal Tribunal for the former Yugoslavia (ICTY) is a United Nations court of law dealing with war crimes that took place during the conflicts in the Balkans in the 1990s. Established in 1993, the ICTY was the first war crimes court created by the UN and the first international war crimes tribunal since the Nuremberg and Tokyo tribunals.

topics.title: North Atlantic Treaty Organization
topics.description: Stories about the North Atlantic Treaty Organization which was formed in 1949 to promote mutual defense and cooperation amongst its member states in North America and Europe.

topics.title: National Bank of Poland
topics.description: News of activities by, or involving, the central bank of Poland.

topics.title: Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development

topics.title: Paper & Forest Products (TRBC)
topics.description: Operators of forests, pulp and paper mills, producers and manufacturers of wood and paper products, and providers of related services.

topics.title: Textiles & Leather Goods (TRBC)
topics.description: Operators of cotton farms, and woven and non-woven fabric mills, as well as manufacturers of basic leather goods. Includes producers of stock and primary leather goods, cotton, wool, rayon, polyester, silk, velvet, hemp, lace and other fabric mills, fur bearing animal production and basic textile goods such as linens, cloths, rags and bed sheets.

topics.title: Utilities (TRBC)
topics.description: Producers and distributors of electricity, natural gas, water and steam, among other utility services, whose distribution facilities and infrastructure are regulated by government. The sector serves private and industrial consumers.

topics.title: Multiline Utilities (TRBC)
topics.description: Producers and distributors both electric power and natural gas. Includes utility companies with significant operations in multiple utility operations consisting of electric, natural gas, water and other regulated utility operations.

topics.title: Water & Other Utilities (TRBC)
topics.description: Operators of water delivery infrastructure, water treatment, filtration and sewage disposal plants. Includes operators supplying geothermal, steam heat and cooled air.

topics.title: Apparel & Accessories (TRBC)
topics.description: Manufacturers of clothing such as, men's, women's, children's and pet clothing, uniforms, jackets, hats, socks, gloves, robes, hosiery and swim suits. Includes producers of accessories such as handbags, attache cases, umbrellas, cosmetic bags, jewelry, watches, luggage.

topics.title: Wireless Telecommunications Services (TRBC)
topics.description: Providers of wireless communication services, such as paging, cell phone and other satellite telecommunication services.

topics.title: Wealth Management
topics.description: Companies engaged in the business of wealth management, including retail brokerage, private wealth advisory and private banking.

topics.title: Forest & Wood Products (TRBC)
topics.description: Producers of lumber, plywood, sawdust, wood flooring, shingles, tiles, laminated veneer, fencing and other primary wood products. Includes operators of timber tracks and nurseries and providers of cutting, logging, transporting, as well as other forest management services.

topics.title: Advertising & Marketing (TRBC level 4)
topics.description: Print, digital and broadcast media advertising agencies, marketing research, public opinion research, public relations and other marketing and consulting services.

topics.title: Apparel & Accessories Retailers (TRBC level 4)
topics.description: Retailers of men, women and children's clothing and accessories stores, including retailers of handbags, footwear, leather goods, luggage, jewelry and watches.

topics.title: Auto, Truck & Motorcycle Parts (TRBC level 4)
topics.description: Manufacturers of original and replacement parts for cars, light trucks and motorcycles.

topics.title: Casinos & Gaming (TRBC level 4)
topics.description: Operators of casinos and gambling operations. Includes stand-alone casinos, casino hotels, riverboat casinos, bingo halls, gambling machine manufacturers, lottery services, internet gambling services, bookmaking and other gambling services.

topics.title: Specialty Chemicals (TRBC level 4)
topics.description: Producers and wholesalers of specialized chemicals such as pigments, inks, dyes, synthetic fibers, filaments and polymers, synthetic chemicals, adhesives, glues and epoxies.

topics.title: Paper Packaging (TRBC level 4)
topics.description: Manufacturers and wholesalers of paper packaging including cardboard, laminated paper containers, and wood-fiber boxes, bags and wrapping paper.

topics.title: Oil & Gas Exploration and Production (TRBC level 4)
topics.description: Explorers, extractors and producers of crude petroleum and natural gas. Includes operators that recover butane, ethane and natural liquefied petroleum gases (LPG) from oil and gas fields in land, water, as well as explorers and producers of unconventional oil and gas.

topics.title: Food Processing (TRBC level 4)
topics.description: Processers and packagers of produce, meats, fish, animal feeds, fruit juices, coffee, tea and dairy products. Includes grain milling, crop cleaning, grading and packaging, animal slaughtering and packaging operations, seafood processing, freezing, canning operations and all other food manufacturers, including pet foods.

topics.title: Home Furnishings (TRBC level 4)
topics.description: Manufacturers of furniture, non-upholstered kitchenware, floor coverings, wall coverings and related furnishings. Includes producers of couches, mattresses, bed frames and headboards, desks, tables, chairs, tables, draws, entertainment centers and stands, wall units, outdoor furniture, carpets, rugs, wall paper, blinds, shades and curtains.

topics.title: Appliances, Tools & Housewares (TRBC level 4)
topics.description: Manufacturers of kitchen appliances, hand and light power tools, gardening tools, cookware, silverware and other household goods. Includes manufacturers of stoves, refrigerators, blenders, washer/dryers, vacuum cleaners, pottery, hairdryers, clocks, home use drills, lawnmowers, rakes, shovels, as well as silverware, china, cutlery, cooking utensils and other related house wares.

topics.title: Household Products (TRBC level 4)
topics.description: Manufacturers of non-durable goods such as cleaning products, detergents, disinfectants, brooms, mops, towels and rags, disposable plates and cutlery.

topics.title: Investment Banking & Brokerage Services (TRBC level 4)
topics.description: Providers of investment banking and security brokerage services without significant commercial banking operations, facilitating mergers and acquisitions; underwriting and capital raising via public debt or equity offerings, private placements and restructuring, as well as auxiliary security brokerage services.

topics.title: Iron & Steel (TRBC level 4)
topics.description: Miners and processers of iron ore and coke coal and producers of iron and steel. Includes providers of metal ore exploration and mining services, operators of iron and steel foundries for beneficiating, smelting, rolling, forging, spinning, recycling, stamping, polishing and plating of iron and steel products such as pipes, tubes, wire, spring, rolls and bars, and providers of metal processing services and wholesalers of iron and steel products.

topics.title: Non-Paper Containers & Packaging (TRBC level 4)
topics.description: Manufacturers and wholesalers of metal, glass and plastic containers, and providers of diversified, paper and non-paper container and packaging services.

topics.title: Marine Port Services (TRBC level 4)
topics.description: Owners and operators of marine ports and supporting services such as port loading and unloading, canal, harbor and docking services, longshoreman support, tugboat, navigational control and other related services.

topics.title: Personal Products (TRBC level 4)
topics.description: Manufacturers of toiletries, personal hygienic and birth control products. Includes producers of combs, toothbrushes, mouthwash, perfumes, cosmetics, deodorants, hand and body soaps, sunscreen lotion, walking canes, burial caskets, hair pieces, prophylactics, spectacles, contact lenses and other personal products.

topics.title: Real Estate Rental, Development & Operations (TRBC level 4)
topics.description: Companies engaged in developing, renting and leasing residential, retail, office, industrial and commercial properties.

topics.title: Recreational Products (TRBC level 4)
topics.description: Manufacturers of sporting goods, camping equipment, motor homes, caravans, bicycles and musical instruments.

topics.title: Restaurants & Bars (TRBC level 4)
topics.description: Operators of restaurants, diners, taverns, pubs, nightclubs, banquet halls, fixed location snack bars, food cart vendors, food service contractors and wholesalers of commercial food service equipment.

topics.title: Marine Freight & Logistics (TRBC level 4)
topics.description: Operators of marine and inland water transportation services for freight. Includes deep-sea freight and cargo, barge, inland water, vessel chartering and other freight transportation operations.

topics.title: Non-Alcoholic Beverages (TRBC)
topics.description: Manufacturers of non-alcoholic beverages such as water, fruit drinks, soft drinks, coffee and tea, as well as other flavored beverages.

topics.title: Auto Vehicles, Parts & Service Retailers (TRBC level 4)
topics.description: Retailers of auto vehicles, parts and services.

topics.title: Companies engaged in the provision of scheduled and chartered air freight services.
topics.description: Companies engaged in the provision of scheduled and chartered air freight services.

topics.title: Diversified Chemicals (TRBC level 5)
topics.description: Companies significantly engaged in at least two the following industries: Commodity Chemicals, Agricultural Chemicals and Specialty Chemicals.

topics.title: Oil & Gas Related Equipment and Services (TRBC level 3)
topics.description: Providers of oil and gas drilling and related services, as well as manufacturers of oil related equipment.

topics.title: Healthcare Services & Equipment (TRBC level 2)
topics.description: Manufacturers of medical equipment and supplies, providers of medical technology/software, as well as operators of healthcare facilities and providers of managed healthcare.

topics.title: Homebuilding & Construction Supplies (TRBC level 3)
topics.description: Builders of residential homes, mobile homes and prefabricated homes, and manufacturers of value-added building products and home improvement components.

topics.title: Household Goods (TRBC level 3)
topics.description: Manufacturers of household appliances, tools, house wares and home furnishing goods.

topics.title: Personal & Household Products & Services (TRBC level 3)
topics.description: Manufacturers of non-durable household goods, personal products and providers of personal services.

topics.title: Investment Banking & Investment Services (TRBC level 3)
topics.description: Providers of investment banking, brokerage and investment management services without significant commercial or retail banking operations.

topics.title: Diversified Investment Services (TRBC level 5)
topics.description: Companies that combine investment banking/security brokerage services with investment management/ fund operating operations, none being dominant.

topics.title: All Retail
topics.description: Stories about retail businesses, including online retailers.

topics.title: Specialty Retailers (TRBC level 3)
topics.description: Retailers operating stores and dealerships focused on a single area. Includes auto part, home improvement, home furnishing, office supply, toy, sporting equipment, book, kitchenware and houseware retailers. Includes also garden centers, car and truck dealerships.

topics.title: Conflicts / War / Peace
topics.description: Civil and international wars, including violent political uprisings.

topics.title: Defense
topics.description: The affairs of the various branches of the armed services in an individual country or alliance of countries, including defense procurement and weapons policy.  Excluding actual combat.

topics.title: Asylum / Immigration / Refugees
topics.description: Asylum, immigration, refugees, visa, passport and extradition issues.

topics.title: Civil Unrest
topics.description: Disturbances to internal peace or public order caused by the collective actions of a group of citizens. Including both legal and illegal acts including demonstrations, protests, marches, riots; hooliganism and looting.

topics.title: Military Conflicts
topics.description: Hostile actions or attacks involving the use of regular or irregular armed forces between countries, by one or more countries against one or more other countries, or within a country between opposing groups, usually for territorial or political gain.  Does not include violence between individuals or for criminal intent.

topics.title: Bombing (Non-Military)
topics.description: Placing or detonation of an explosive or incendiary device with the intention of causing damage to property and / or loss of life.  Also includes the threat (false or otherwise) of exploding such a device.  Does not include bombardment as part of a military action.

topics.title: Anti-competitive Behaviour / Price Fixing
topics.description: News about alleged or actual anti-competitive commercial behaviour by companies or their officers which if proven would be punishable in law.

topics.title: Crime / Law / Justice
topics.description: Crime, law and justice.

topics.title: Hijacking / Piracy
topics.description: Commandeer a vehicle by coercion, sometimes for political or percuniary motives.

topics.title: Corruption / Bribery / Embezzlement
topics.description: Abusing one's position of trust for personal dishonest gain, being open to bribes and / or acting without the virtues, integrity or honesty of an individual beholden with the same position of responsibility.

topics.title: Crime
topics.description: The commission / omission of an act in violation of international / domestic law and for which, if convicted, punishment is imposed.  Includes government policy on crime and crime figures.

topics.title: Computer Crime / Hacking / Cybercrime
topics.description: Computer hackers or crackers illegally gaining access to another's computer system to obtain secret information or commit acts of sabotage. Including the deliberate creation or spreading of computer viruses.

topics.title: Kidnapping
topics.description: The forcible abduction of one or more individuals for ideological, political or pecuniary motives. Also includes hostages held to secure the taker's demands.

topics.title: Murder / Suspected Murder
topics.description: An unlawful killing of a human being where there was an intention to kill or cause serious harm.

topics.title: Drug Trafficking / Narcotics
topics.description: Illegal activities involving the use and trafficking of drugs.

topics.title: Intellectual Property Crime
topics.description: Counterfeiting and other intellectual property crime. Excludes civil disputes concerning intellectual property laws, which are covered by Intellectual Property [IPROP].

topics.title: Financial Fraud / Securities Fraud
topics.description: Acts of deception intended for personal gain or to cause a loss to others involving financial transactions.

topics.title: Sex Crimes
topics.description: Forcing an individual to participate in acts of a sexual or indecent nature by using or threatening physical force. Including forcing another person to submit to sexual intercourse without consent.

topics.title: White Collar Crime / Fraud / Corporate Crime
topics.description: Acts of deception deliberately practised in order to secure unfair or unlawful financial gain, including fraudulent behaviour in sports. Also acts of financial deception or improper accounting by executive officers of a listed or unlisted company in contravention of securities, disclosure and accountancy law in order to secure unfair or unlawful gain or in order to mislead stakeholders in the company as to the true state of its financial affairs.

topics.title: Disasters / Accidents
topics.description: Natural disasters such as floods, earthquakes, hurricanes and volcanic eruptions; manmade disasters and accidents, including road accidents, plane crashes, train crashes, shipwrecks and industrial accidents; their human and economic consequences.

topics.title: Floods
topics.description: Floods, tidal waves and tsunami including damage and loss of life, clean up and rebuilding, long-term implications and insurance costs.

topics.title: Wind / Hurricanes / Typhoons / Tornadoes
topics.description: Wind, storms, hurricanes, cyclones, tornadoes and typhoons and their effects. The impact of strong winds on economic activities such as the production, transport and prices of commodities and energy.

topics.title: Ground Accidents / Collisions
topics.description: Major road or rail accidents.

topics.title: Air Accidents
topics.description: Aircraft accidents.

topics.title: Droughts
topics.description: Droughts including the extent, severity and implications of.

topics.title: Sea Accidents
topics.description: Major accidents at sea or on inland waters.

topics.title: Earthquakes
topics.description: Earthquakes, volcanic eruptions and landslides.  Effects of seismic activity including damage, loss of life, rescue efforts and long-term implications.

topics.title: Fires
topics.description: Accidental explosions or building fires.  Not bombs or bomb damage as part of a military campaign.

topics.title: Tsunami
topics.description: News about tsunamis and similar large destructive waves in a large body of water.

topics.title: Wildfires / Forest Fires
topics.description: Forest and brush fires including extent of damage and efforts to contain.

topics.title: Human Interest / Brights / Odd News
topics.description: Unusual human interest items. Covers both the bizarre and the humorous. Strange but true stories.

topics.title: Overseas Development Aid
topics.description: Overseas development policy and development aid. Includes emergency relief aid

topics.title: EU Institutions
topics.description: News about the European Commission, Parliament, Courts and Councils.

topics.title: Fundamental Rights / Civil Liberties
topics.description: Policies concerning claimed fundamental human rights and civil liberties.

topics.title: Privacy / Data Protection
topics.description: Policies concerning privacy laws, such as the protection of personal data.

topics.title: Diplomacy / Foreign Policy
topics.description: Foreign affairs including summits, treaties and official visits. International disputes and co-operation. Also including actions of diplomats and embassies.

topics.title: Education
topics.description: Issues relating to education; legislation, performance, curricula, teachers and fees.  Including public, private, nursery, primary and secondary schooling, further education, college and university.

topics.title: Lawmaking
topics.description: The formulation of legislation by supranational, national, sub-national or local parliaments and the legislative decisions of courts of law.

topics.title: Non-Governmental Organizations
topics.description: Not-for-profit organisations which operate independently of governments and are not constituted as a political party or have any criminal purpose.

topics.title: Government / Politics
topics.description: Political parties, national and sub-national parliaments, legislation and constitutional issues. Opinion polls and referendums. Local government bodies and the civil service.

topics.title: Retirement / Old Age
topics.description: All news about retirement and related issues, including financial regulation and financial industry trends that affect retirement.

topics.title: Subsidies
topics.description: Government support for an industry / activity that provides it with a competitive trading advantage.

topics.title: Taxation
topics.description: The levying of direct and indirect taxes by national, sub-national or local governments or parliaments.

topics.title: International Trade
topics.description: Commercial agreements, tariffs and quotas between countries or groupings of countries. Including the World Trade Organisation and regional trading alliances.

topics.title: Tariffs
topics.description: Government imposed system of duties on imports / exports.

topics.title: Women's Issues
topics.description: Women's Issues, including women's rights.

topics.title: Climate Politics
topics.description: Issues of climate change and evidence of global warming and public policies to affect climate changes.

topics.title: Advocacy Groups / Pressure Groups / Lobbies
topics.description: Non-governmental organizations whose aim is to influence government or quasi-government policies in a specific area.

topics.title: Freedom of Speech / Censorship
topics.description: Freedom of speech / censorship and press freedom.

topics.title: Children / Youth Issues
topics.description: News about social issues affecting children and young adults.

topics.title: Government Finances
topics.description: Government finance, budgets and tax policy

topics.title: Human Rights / Civil Rights
topics.description: Legal issues concerning human rights and abuses. Including civil liberties, equality and discrimination, freedom of expression and freedom to worship.

topics.title: Aid Relief / Humanitarian Agencies
topics.description: Non-governmental organizations involved in the provision of aid and development assistance.

topics.title: Lesbian / Gay / Bisexual / Transsexual
topics.description: Issues concerning sexual orientation.

topics.title: Nuclear Armaments / Nuclear Proliferation
topics.description: News concerning nuclear weapons including international arms control affairs.

topics.title: Race Relations / Ethnic Issues
topics.description: Relations among and issues concerning racial and ethnic groups, including discrimination, stereotyping, abuse of individuals based on race or ethnic background, segregation, integration, public policy, and legal measures and procedures concerning racial or ethnic groups and issues.

topics.title: Society / Social Issues
topics.description: Society and social issues.

topics.title: Elections / Voting
topics.description: National; regional; local elections, manifestos, referendums and polling.

topics.title: Gubernatorial Elections
topics.description: Elections of state or provincial governors.

topics.title: Lower House Elections
topics.description: Elections to the lower house of a legislative body.

topics.title: Presidential Elections
topics.description: Presidential elections.

topics.title: Upper House Elections
topics.description: Elections to the upper house (such as a senate) of a legislative body.

topics.title: US Government News
topics.description: US Federal government politics, policies and economics.

topics.title: International / National Security
topics.description: International and national security considerations relating to hostile organizations / countries. Including all covert action, all intelligence gathering, and all steps taken to defend against action by hostile organizations / countries.  Also includes acts committed by hostile organizations / countries.

topics.title: Military Procurement
topics.description: Issues related to the procurement of military equipmnent.

topics.title: Gun Control
topics.description: Policies to regulate the private ownership of fire arms.

topics.title: Insurgencies
topics.description: Guerrilla and rebel groups involved in armed rebellion, usually having access to light arms and bomb-making materials, but not full-scale military ordnance.

topics.title: Buddhism
topics.description: A religious system from ancient Nepal and India, founded by Siddhartha Gautama (the Buddha), that says moral behaviour can lead to Nirvana, the state of enlightenment and end of reincarnation.  Its main branches are Theravada (dominant in South and Southeast Asia) and Mahayana (in China, Japan, Tibet and northern Asia).

topics.title: Judaism
topics.description: The monotheistic religion of the Jews, tracing its origins to Abraham with spiritual and ethical principles embodied chiefly in the Hebrew Scriptures and the Talmud.  Apart from Orthodox Judaism, there are Conservative, Hasidic, Reform and other movements.

topics.title: Religion / Belief
topics.description: Religion / Belief.

topics.title: Christianity
topics.description: All denominations that believe Jesus Christ is the Son of God who rose from the dead after his crucifixion, as related in the Bible.  Refers to all Christians, their churches or relations among different Christian denominations.

topics.title: Hinduism
topics.description: The dominant faith in India, Nepal and among the Tamils in Sri Lanka.  It is henotheistic, i.e. believes in one god without denying other deities.  The main Hindu gods are Brahma the Creator, Vishnu (Krishna) the Preserver and Shiva the Destroyer.

topics.title: Islam
topics.description: Islamic religion and culture.

topics.title: Climate Change
topics.description: All news coverage associated with the broader topic of climate change.

topics.title: Environment
topics.description: Conservation; green issues; recycling; energy saving; alternative energy; natural world; environmental disasters; environmental politics; natural resources; waste; government policy.

topics.title: Genetically Modified Organisms
topics.description: Genetically modified organisms their development, deployment and any products made from them.  Also including government policy and opposition to.

topics.title: Health / Medicine
topics.description: Health; disease; medical research; preventative medicine; hospitals; government policy.

topics.title: Science
topics.description: All aspects of science; research and new technology; applied sciences; human sciences; natural sciences; philosophical sciences; scientific exploration; government policy.

topics.title: Internet / World Wide Web
topics.description: New developments in, and issues affecting, the internet / world wide web, such as viruses, domain names, freedom of access and censorship.

topics.title: Artificial Intelligence
topics.description: News about artificial intelligence (AI), the ability of digital systems to perform tasks commonly associated with intelligent beings, and its use in applications such as medical diagnosis, computer search engines, voice recognition and autonomous vehicles.

topics.title: Pollution
topics.description: Short and long-term pollution affecting air, water and land.

topics.title: Information Technologies / Computer Sciences
topics.description: News about the science of information technology and computing.

topics.title: Life Sciences

topics.title: Nature / Wildlife
topics.description: Environmental issues concerning flora or fauna.

topics.title: Space Exploration
topics.description: Astronomy / space exploration including new research into celestial objects, space, and the physical universe.  Also spaceflights of manned and unmanned vehicles

topics.title: Doping / Drugs Tests
